thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mid-Con Energy Partners Posts Q4 Loss Per Share $0.30

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mid-Con Energy Partners Posts Q4 Loss Per Share $0.30
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Mid-Con Energy Partners Lp:
* MID-CON ENERGY PARTNERS, LP ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 OPERATING AND FINANCIAL RESULTS, 2017 YEAR END PROVED RESERVES, AND 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.30 * QTRLY AVERAGE NET DAILY PRODUCTION 3,359 BOE/D VERSUS 3,837 BOE/D
* QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $10.8 MILLION VERSUS $11.4 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NET PRODUCTION 2,800 BOE/D TO 3,200 BOE/D * ESTIMATED CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $12.0 MILLION FOR FY 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
